data.name: Golden Light of Rose
data.detailed_description:
Add to Wishlist

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1245430/Golden_Light/


About the Game



Welcome to the Meat Zone. Prop Hunt where PROPS HUNT YOU. Also, it's a free-to-play horror roguelike with online Co-op!

Golden Light of Rose is free ver. of the Golden Light - a procedural dark comedy horror game with roguelike elements and an eerie atmosphere. It features all main game mechanics with a SECRET LVL different from Golden Light!

  • Play as Rose â€“ a character from the original game, and follow her during her first time in the gut.
  • Dive into 3 procedurally generated levels with randomized weapons to fight various enemies and spooks!
  • Play solo or in co-op with up to 4 people!
  • Find a secret LVL!ðŸ‘€

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1245430/Golden_Light/

data.short_description: Eat weapons, be scared and question your own mind in this Survival-Horror FPS Prop Hunt Roguelike about meat. With online Co-op! Golden Light of Rose is a story prequel to Golden Light which follows Rose during her first time in the gut.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i-5-4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 1Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i-5-4000+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 2Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains anatomically incorrect nudity and violence.
